## TryCpScenario.awaitDhtSync() method

Await DhtOp integration of all players for a given cell.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
awaitDhtSync(cellId: CellId): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cellId | CellId | Cell id to await DHT sync for. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A promise that is resolved when the DHTs of all conductors are synced.
